metadata.description: Domain expert skills powered by SpiceAI hybrid search

plugins.name: dw3-skills
plugins.description: Domain expert skills for Claude Code. Uses spice CLI directly. Requires spice on PATH and SPICE_CLOUD_API_KEY set.

plugins.name: dw3-skills-cowork
plugins.description: Domain expert skills for Cowork. Uses MCP server to bridge spice CLI from host into the Cowork VM. Requires Bun and SPICE_CLOUD_API_KEY set.
